definition: legendary magic potion of immortals/panacea/fig. wonder solution to a problem
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]

sentences.english: What one thing is your sure fire bad mood buster?
sentences.chinese: 哪个是你确保消除心情不好的灵药呢？

sentences.english: No number nine love potion could make me love her more.
sentences.chinese: 九号爱情灵药也不会令我对她更加痴迷。

sentences.english: Grandpapa says it is a panacea.
sentences.chinese: 爷爷说那是一种万灵药。

sentences.english: The experiment analyzed the relations between the the chemical damage of pendimethalin and the time change.
sentences.chinese: 通过试验分析了二甲戊灵药害随时间的变化关系。

sentences.english: There is no nostrum in the world. To keep FIT, just come to this body-building centre and have a try.
sentences.chinese: 世上本无万能灵药，欲健康，请来本健美中心试一试。

sentences.english: They should look east for a cure.
sentences.chinese: 它们应该向东方看齐，寻求灵药。

sentences.english: As a late convert to marriage, I don’t think it is a panacea.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个新婚者，我不认为这是一个万灵药。

sentences.english: We cannot tell the mother there is not one size fits all," she said.
sentences.chinese: 我们无法告诉这位母亲哪一种喂养方法是万灵药。

sentences.english: Governments tend to treat CCTs as a panacea.
sentences.chinese: 政府却喜欢把CCT当做万灵药。

sentences.english: Some healers say they have given muti to Bafana players, and Mr.
sentences.chinese: 一些巫医说，他们已经将灵药给了南非国家队的球员。

sentences.english: You could trade in your car for a model that guzzles less of the expensive elixir.
sentences.chinese: 你可以买卖你的车作模型，各式那么昂贵的万灵药。

definition: Lingshi county in Jinzhong 晉中|晋中[Jin4 zhong1], Shanxi
maker of immortality pill/concocting magic pills
a rare treasure/sth priceless and unique
legendary magic potion of immortals/panacea/fig. wonder solution to a problem
(Taoism) talisman in the form of a painting of symbols thought to have magical powers
